{{also|靑信號}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あお|しん|ごう|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あおしんごう}}

# a [[green]] [[traffic light]], a [[green light]] (abbr. {{l|ja|青}})

====Usage notes====
This is literally ''blue signal'' which leads Japanese speakers of English to say "blue signal" when they mean [[green light]] more often than not.

====Coordinate terms====
* {{ja-r|黄信号|きしんごう|gloss=[[yellow light]]}}
* {{ja-r|赤信号|あかしんごう|gloss=[[red light]]}}

===See also===
* {{ja-r|信号機|しんごうき|gloss=[[traffic light]], the signalling device}}
